abstract: Thirteen migrants, including seven children, drown after their boat capsizes off Greek island of Farmakonisi, near Turkish coast.
lead_paragraph: Their boat, nearly 20 feet long, was carrying 29 migrants when it capsized Tuesday night, a spokeswoman said.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Greece: 13 Migrants Drown Near Turkey

snippet: Their boat, nearly 20 feet long, was carrying 29 migrants when it capsized Tuesday night, a spokeswoman said.
